Scrape Physicians' Data with Tor

Source: R/this_one_works.R
scrape_physicians_data_with_tor.Rd

This function scrapes data for physicians within a specified ID range, excluding wrong IDs.

Usage

scrape_physicians_data_with_tor(
  startID,
  endID,
  torPort,
  wrong_ids_path = NULL,
  output_format = c("csv", "parquet")
)

Arguments

startID

The starting ID for scraping.

endID

The ending ID for scraping.

torPort

The port number for Tor SOCKS proxy.

wrong_ids_path

Optional path to a roster of IDs to skip. CSV and Parquet files are supported.

output_format

File format to use when saving scraped results. Choose from "csv" (default) or "parquet".

Value

A dataframe containing scraped physicians' data.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # interactive()
# Running this helper requires a local Tor proxy and network access, so we
# keep the example non-executing on automated checks.
scrape_result <- scrape_physicians_data_with_tor(
  startID = 9045999,
  endID = 9046000,
  torPort = 9150
)
}
